Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbal forums!

For many-A-Month I have been viewing you from afar. Laughing at your posts, Marveling at your wondrous crafts, wishing that I could meet you all and shake your experienced hands...

But finally I have landed! Now I can show my stuff to the community, And show you what I am all abou-

-WE INTERRUPT THIS MESSAGE WITH A MESSAGE FROM OUR SPONSOR-

*Kerbal Kreme, Kerbal Kreme, The Tastiest Ice-cream now with Minmus Sheen, OH It's Kerbal Kreme*

-And now, back to the scheduled program.-

--WE will Crash on the mun! We will Crash on Duna! We will Crash on Laythe!

*Breaks into tears*

I HAVE A DREAM, THAT MY KERBONAUTS WILL PLAY IN THE RUINS OF THESE BEAUTIFUL WRECKS OF PAST GENERATIONS I HAVE A-

sorry, got carried away I guess...

yeah...

ZodiaK. Now on the forums!
haha, Welcome to the forums Zodiak!
Welcome to the forums, ZodiaK. I hope you find them enjoyable.

One question though: How In the Holy Heck do I Add an avatar, status (like yours hockey: ringin' the post), and sig?

ZodiaK. Thanks in advanced!

Hey Zodiak,

All new member of the forum are automatically moderated for a certain period of time (to avoid spam).

During that time you will not be able to set avatar/signature.

Once you are clear, you will be able to do so.

And welcome to the forum.

Okay then.

ZodiaK. Thanks for the welcome party!
Welcome to the forums!

It seems like I've been approved (seeing as it displays "bottle rocketeer"), so how do I change my avatar, desc, and sig?

ZodiaK. Nooby to the max, brah!

Look for the settings button! Everything should be there, if you have been here long enough now.

Welcome to the Kerbal forums!

OK, Thx loads, all!

but what about the desc (bottle rocketeer)?

ZodiaK. Inexperienced in the area of "profiles"
I believe that changes with the number of posts you make, and can also probably be altered by a moderator.
You can do it your self too.just look at where the rank is on mine.btw, Welcome to the forums.

great, thanks! but how do I do It to myself is my question.

ZodiaK. I wanna know!
You need to have a certain number of posts first. I believe 10 is that number. Hence why i haven't got an avatar yet nor signature.
Welcome to the KSP forums!

yuriski... you have both an avatar and a desc that says "curious George", but you only have 3 posts

what I want to know is how to make my desc. say "curious george" or likewise

ZodiaK. The dead horse is flogged, good sir

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Can anyone tell me how to change the thing that says "Bottle rocketeer"?

ZodiaK. 4th time the charm
It is an option on your profile. Go to Forum Actions - Edit Profile. There should be a thing that says 'Custom User Title'.
Settings->edit profile-> change user title.

Thanks all for a great Welcome! I just posted my firs craft if any of you would like to see

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/48516-The-ScoutR%21

ZodiaK. Enterprising Individual With an amazing mind. ( It isn't gloating if you're being truthful )
Want to partner with the INAPRD?
